member.name: P:Windows.Devices.Printers.Print3DDevice.PrintSchema
member.summary: Gets the PrintSchema object for obtaining capabilities and print ticket information.
member.returns: The PrintSchema object for obtaining capabilities and print ticket information.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Print3DDevice.FromIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Print3DDevice object that represents a 3D printer connected to the device.
member.param: The device ID of the 3D printer.
member.returns: A Print3DDevice object that corresponds to the specified 3D printer.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.Print3DDevice.GetDeviceSelector
member.summary: Gets an Advanced Query Syntax (AQS) string that can be used to find all 3D printers that are connected to the device.
member.returns: An AQS string that can be used to find all 3D printers connected to the device.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Printers.PrintSchema
member.summary: Provides APIs to access a 3D printer's capabilities and print tickets.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.PrintSchema.GetCapabilitiesAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStreamWithContentType)
member.returns: An XML PrintCapabilities document containing 3D printer capabilities.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.PrintSchema.GetDefaultPrintTicketAsync
member.summary: Gets the 3D printer's default print ticket.
member.returns: An XML PrintTicket document containing the 3D printer's default print ticket.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Printers.PrintSchema.MergeAndValidateWithDefaultPrintTicketAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStreamWithContentType)
member.summary: Creates a new print ticket by merging the user’s selection with the default print ticket and validating that it will work for the device.
member.param: The delta print ticket, specifies the differences between the default print ticket and the user's selections.
member.returns: An XML PrintTicket document containing the suggested print ticket.
